alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Windham, northeastern Tolland, southeastern Worcester, Norfolk, southeastern Middlesex, eastern Hampden and northern Providence Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millbury, or near Worcester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Woonsocket, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Cumberland, Natick, Watertown, Franklin, Needham, Norwood, Milford, Wellesley, Dedham, Walpole, Canton, Lincoln and Westborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...western, eastern, central, southeastern and northeastern Massachusetts...and Rhode Island.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
